EmailTemplate.subject: How to protect enterprise communications in the age of cyberattacks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Webinar
Digital transformation without compromising security The rise of mobility and BYOD, along with enterprise digital transformation, means that your enterprise has a wealth of new tools to create seamless communications for your employees and customers.
However, there is a “but.”
With the benefits come new vulnerabilities for IP based attacks and the need to control communication streams as they cross your network boundaries.
How can you protect your business and ensure that IP voice and video quality of experience is maximized? Find out by watching our webinar.
Irwin Lazar of Nemertes Research and Bryan Davies of Nokia explore:
- Why IP communications is a key component of digital transformation
- The need to ensure security and privacy of voice and video – and how to do it - What the attack surfaces are for IP-based communications - What IPX is and how it impacts the future of business communications security - And more… Enjoy! {{my.Email Signature Person}} {{my.Email Signature Title}}, Nokia © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
